Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class PlayerController extends Object implements GUIController
This class is the controller of the player-view.
